memberdef.name: requestPlugin

briefdescription.para: Create a plugin of kind with input datasets.

parameterdescription.para: Kind of plugin (name of the plugin)
Zero or more datasets upon which the plugin is based (e.g. analysis plugin)
Zero or more datasets that the plugin produces (e.g. analysis plugin)

simplesect.para: Pointer to created plugin, nullptr if creation failed
